scenario: Student requesting assignment extension from professor

required: Specific reason for extension (illness, emergency, etc.)
key_elements.tone: Professional but warm, not overly formal

good_example.subject: Request for Extension on [Assignment Name]
good_example.body:
Dear Professor [Name],

I am writing to request an extension on the [assignment name] currently due this Friday, [date].

I have been ill with [condition] since [date] and have a doctor's note documenting my absence. I lost several days of work time and am concerned I cannot complete the assignment to the expected standard by the original deadline.

Would it be possible to submit the assignment by Monday, [date] instead? This would give me the weekend to complete the work properly.

I understand this may cause inconvenience and I apologize for the short notice. Thank you for considering my request.

Best regards,
[Name]

common_mistakes: Too much personal detail about illness
